metadata.title: CVE-2016-3747 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Use-after-free vulnerability in the mm-video-v4l2 venc component inmediaserver in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-07-01 allows attackers to gain privileges via acrafted application, as demonstrated by obtaining Signature orSignatureOrSystem access, aka internal bug 27903498.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
